message.content:
cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.CG, cs.GT. 

This paper deals with the hardness of hypergraph coloring, which is a topic in computational complexity theory (cs.CC) and graph theory (cs.DS). The use of coding theory, such as Quadratic Code and Low Degree Long Code, suggests a connection to information theory (cs.IT). The construction of CSP instances with superposition hardness involves combinatorial geometry, which is a topic in computational geometry (cs.CG) and graph theory (cs.GT).
